headline: Fortive (FTV) vs Dayforce (DAY): Which Industrial Software Play Wins?
summary: Fortive (NYSE: FTV) and Dayforce (NYSE: DAY) both reported Q3 2025 earnings that exposed fundamental cracks beneath their software-driven growth narratives. Fortive’s industrial automation platform saw earnings collapse 75% year-over-year despite modest revenue growth. Dayforce’s HCM software business swung from consistent profitability to a catastrophic loss that missed estimates by 686%. One Bleeds Margin, The ... Fortive (FTV) vs Dayforce (DAY): Which Industrial Software Play Wins?
